description: Three (3) reach in growth chambers, to meet the requirements of AAFC RDC, Saskatoon.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Summary

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is soliciting bids for the supply and delivery of three (3) Reach in Growth Chambers, as per solicitation number 01R11-24-C076. This tender is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI only.

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C076
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-20T17:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-06
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-28
* Tendering Location: Saskatoon, Canada
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Mandatory Technical Criteria

* The supplier must hold a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* The supplier must meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price.

## Bidder Eligibility

* Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to bid.
* Suppliers that do not have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada, are not eligible to bid.

## Supplier Pre-Qualification

* Suppliers may qualify under Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies at any time.
* Interested suppliers should download solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

## Contact Information

* Name: Camille Sobczak
* Email: camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (204) 430-5426
* Address: 400-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3C 3G7, Canada

Note that some information has been edited out or rephrased to make the content more concise and professional. Also, I have made sure to maintain the same structure and format as the original text. Let me know if you'd like me to make any further changes!
